His thesis is on socio-economic differences and intergenerational transmission in violent offending and victimization in Finland. BibStructured.title: We replicated this analysis using number of prior crimes rather than crime-type speciﬁc variables as a measure. This was done in order to assess whether those on more persistent criminal careers would
BibStructured.rawString: 1. We replicated this analysis using number of prior crimes rather than crime-type speciﬁc variables as a measure. This was done in order to assess whether those on more persistent criminal careers would

BibStructured.title: We replicated this analysis using number of prior crimes rather than crime-type speciﬁc variables as a measure. This was done in order to assess whether those on more persistent criminal careers would have a particularly elevated risk compared to those with only one offence
BibStructured.rawString: 1. We replicated this analysis using number of prior crimes rather than crime-type speciﬁc variables as a measure. This was done in order to assess whether those on more persistent criminal careers would have a particularly elevated risk compared to those with only one offence. This proved to be true. Those with several offences in the past had a particularly high crime probability. However, the results

BibStructured.title: This proved to be true. Those with several offences in the past had a particularly high crime probability. However, the results for the effects of SES variables were similar in both analyses
BibStructured.rawString: have a particularly elevated risk compared to those with only one offence. This proved to be true. Those with several offences in the past had a particularly high crime probability. However, the results for the effects of SES variables were similar in both analyses, so we decided to keep the original crime-type speciﬁc controls.
